coffee_beans.name: DECAF SIDAMO NATURAL
coffee_beans.taste: Strawberry jam, pomegranate, and dark chocolate

coffee_beans.name: LONGBERRY
coffee_beans.taste: Smooth, full body with a winey, sweet, and bright acidity and fruity notes of blueberry

coffee_beans.name: LA MINITA ESTATE
coffee_beans.taste: Brilliant acidity, a medium body, and sweet flavors of orange citrus, caramelized sugar, and fine chocolate. It is impeccably balanced with a long, satisfying finish

coffee_beans.name: KONA EXTRA FANCY
coffee_beans.taste: Fruit / Floral / Nuts / Milk Chocolate / Caramel / Slightly Sweet

coffee_beans.name: ROBUSTA
coffee_beans.taste: Coffee made from robusta coffee beans are stronger, nuttier, and darker than arabica coffee
